content.rendered:
On this page you will be able to find solicitations issued by the Embassy of the United States of America in Ghana for the acquisition of commodities and/or services.

Solicitation from USAID-Ghana can be found here

Solicitation from USAID-West Africa can be found here

excerpt.rendered: On this page you will be able to find solicitations issued by the Embassy of the United States of America in Ghana for the acquisition of commodities and/or services. Solicitation from USAID-Ghana can be found here Solicitation from USAID-West Africa can be found here
